posts.post_content:
For sale is a T-206 Ames NY Giants portrait version. Nice front but Sweet Caporal 350 back has paper loss. See scans for details...any questions feel free to ask. Email or PM is fine. Thanks,
Joshua

Price: $18 shipping including
